name: Torn - Ludum Dare 41
description:
Torn is a Horror and dating sim made with unreal engine for the LudumDare41 Compo. 

You died, you woke up in Hell and that's not the worst part, you are required to have a mate....

Explore an environment and interact with 4 potential bizarre suitors in Hell , choosing finally who you will be forced spend all eternity with. 

A absurd and surreal dating sim - Lynch meets love. 

Contains Adult and Disturbing themes. Made for Ludum Dare 41  - Incompatible Themes 

Contains Adult and Disturbing themes. Made for Ludum Dare 41 0 Incompatible Themes
